mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_item_strc_d (base_item_code, trgt_item_code, strc_type_code, valid_start_dtm, valid_end_dtm, rgst_user, rgst_dtm, upd_user, upd_dtm) VALUES (#{baseItemCode}, #{trgtItemCode}, #{strcTypeCode}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{validEndDtm}, #{rgstUser}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{updUser}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
